name: Boxed In!
description:
Hello, thank you for checking out my 4th game made for my Intro to Game Dev class!

This game idea was actually scrapped for my second game but after all the knowledge I've gained since then, I wanted to try my hand at making this game idea come to life! I've always loved puzzles like these, so I wanted to try and make one that looks like it was from an app store of some sorts.

This game uses assets from KayKit's Dungeon pack which you can check out here.

The character model and its animations were made by me in Blender.

The music is provided by Kevin MacLeod:

The Path of the Goblin King by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4503-the-path-of-the-goblin-king
License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

The Descent by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4490-the-descent

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
